Method Detail

getId

public java.lang.String getId()
Description copied from interface: ILoginInfo2
Return the Authentication ID. By default, subclasses of AbstractLoginInfo return the name of the class. This ID is used to persist the authentication information for future use.

Specified by:
getId in interface ILoginInfo2
Overrides:
getId in class AbstractLoginInfo
Returns:
authentication type id

handleCredentials

public void handleCredentials(com.ibm.team.repository.common.transport.ITeamServer teamServer)
                       throws TeamRepositoryException
Description copied from interface: ILoginInfo2
Set the credential on the TeamServer. This call is made usually from ITeamRepository.login(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor). The credentials set on the TeamServer from this method are used for authentication during a Request to the server.

Throws:
TeamRepositoryException

validateLoggedInUser

public boolean validateLoggedInUser(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String userid)
Description copied from interface: ILoginInfo2
Validates the Logged in user using the locate credentials that are stored in this LoginInfo. This call is made usually from ITeamRepository.login(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor) after the user is logged in.

Specified by:
validateLoggedInUser in interface ILoginInfo2
Overrides:
validateLoggedInUser in class AbstractLoginInfo
Returns:
true, if the credentials match, false otherwise.

setLoginProperties

public void setLoginProperties(java.util.Properties properties)
Description copied from interface: ILoginInfo2
Load the Properties of each LoginInfo that were persisted using the ILoginInfo2.getLoginProperties() method. This has to be implemented by each subclass of AbstractLoginInfo so the custom properties can be loaded.

getSecuredLoginProperties

public java.util.Properties getSecuredLoginProperties()
                                               throws SavedPasswordNotObtainedException
Returns a new instance of Properties that contains the password with the username as the key

Specified by:
getSecuredLoginProperties in interface ILoginInfo2
Overrides:
getSecuredLoginProperties in class AbstractLoginInfo
Returns:
secured properties. Properties are stored in a key=value manner.
Throws:
SavedPasswordNotObtainedException

setSecuredLoginProperties

public void setSecuredLoginProperties(java.util.Properties secureProperties)
Description copied from interface: ILoginInfo2
Set the secured properties on this object. These properties were stored using encryption on the file system. Properties passed are in the same format as what was returned by ILoginInfo2.getSecuredLoginProperties(). Example of a secured property would be password in most cases.

Specified by:
setSecuredLoginProperties in interface ILoginInfo2
Overrides:
setSecuredLoginProperties in class AbstractLoginInfo
Parameters:
secureProperties - Secured properties in key=value manner.
